phrases: The boat is almost ready to go,
I have nothing to say to him!
He is got balls, setting foot on the guild's sacred ground
without permission and while in exile...
I heard about his battle with Hades.
Seems he saved your lives by shielding you.
But still, they were the actions of a person who is unaffiliated with the guild.
That is how he is protected the guild all these years.
I just lent a hand here.
I was traveling in the area and only dropped by on a whim.
I never intended to stay long.
I think I had to see that disapproving look one last time.
Here Lucy, you can eat this.
What did you pull that out for?!
This world's Lucy's stomach makes that kind of noise?!
Try to speak with a little more delicacy!
Well, in that case, I would better prepare a heaping helping for her meal.
Be that as it may, it was a strange rumbling sound.
Now I can hear heavy breathing!
Hey, man, what are you sitting on?
What am I... A chair, of course...
so it is fitting she that become a chair for Gray-sama!
I told you I am not into that stuff!
What the hell was that for, wench?!
Just looking at you makes my blood boil!
After you got all weepy when we were trapped by that tower...
One more word and I am turning you to stone!
An old wound's acting up on me...
There are still dragons alive after all...
The Black Dragon of the Apocalypse...
Is this the one called Acnologia...?
Do you know where Igneel is?!
I know I told you how I got this arm...
No, how my whole body got like this!
Natsu, take a look at this.
It basically all happened in a flash.
My left arm and leg, and my internal organs, too...
I do not know what kind of guy this Igneel fellow is,
but the black one is an enemy of humanity.
Of that, there is no doubt.
That is not the kind of dragon Natsu and the others love!
Yeah, you are right about that.
Then are we going to fight it?
You are lookin' at this the wrong way, Natsu.
It is not about winning or losing with this one.
It is, how are we going to escape from it?
No, more like, which of us are going to survive?
You are sayin' this thing is going to kill some of us?!
The whole forest is just... gone.
It did this with its roar alone?
What, is it admiring its work?!
I guess that was its way of introducing itself, for now...
We are all still alive, right?!
There is no time to be scared!
We got to get off this island right away!
Get your asses to the boat!
We are all going home together!
I thought you could talk to dragons!
It is not that only I can talk to them!
All dragons have a high level of intelligence!
Maybe it is not using words...
And no one would bother using their full strength against vermin.
There are some things in this world you just cannot fight against.
Humankind is going to learn that now.
It looks like another long journey is about to begin.
There is no way he will win!
If something happened to you, the guild would...
Under the circumstances, we should also...
Do not you dare make light of Fairy Tail!
We are going to crush you!
Are you going to ignore your master's orders even to the end?!
If that is the enemy, I am going to...
Are you sad because someone is going to die?
Has sadness ever killed a person?
The answers are deep in each of your hearts...
I do not know what you are after...
Because my brats are behind me!
leaving a senile old fool behind?
Anybody who says I do not have any more than this, I will kick your ass!
Combine your puny Fairy Tail powers with my lightning attack
and let us knock this bastard for a loop!
Been a long time since the Raijinshuu fought together!
You took everything we got and you are still grinnin'?!
You guys, last chance to take him down!
I am going to beat the crap outta him later!
It is not using the power that it did when it fought me.
It is just playing with us!
It is as healthy as ever!
Even though we gave it all we had...
And we had the power of three dragon slayers...
Even with concentrating the entire guild's power together...
Some help Dragon Slayer Magic is!
What does it intend to do?!
Maybe it will just go home...
Do not let your guard down!
Do not tell me it means to wipe out the whole island?!
Is it going to end for all of us here?
Everyone who can use defensive magic, go full power!
I do not have time to draw runes!
There is plenty of other kinds of defensive magic you can do with letter based magic!
Focus all your magic power on the Fried and Levy!
We are not going to let it end here!
Everyone, join your power together as one!
Let us show this creature the bond of our guild!
Let us all go home together!
A search was conducted in the surrounding sea for the following six months,
but no survivors were to be found...
I remember we were attacked by the black dragon,
then we all got surrounded by this glowing light, and then...
Do you think maybe we all died?
You think Fairy Tail could be killed off so easily?!
For now, let us just track everyone down and go home!
Let us all go home together, to the guild.
